rs.edu.raf.test.model.questions

Class QuestionMatching

  • java.lang.Object
    • rs.edu.raf.test.model.questions.Question
      • rs.edu.raf.test.model.questions.QuestionMatching
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuestionInterface

    public class QuestionMatching
extends Question
    Students respond to matching questions by pairing each of a set of stems with one of the choices provided on the exam. These questions are often used to assess recognition and recall and so are most often used in courses where acquisition of detailed knowledge is an important goal.
    Author:
    marko
